sentences.english: I am single but I love my country.
sentences.chinese: 我愛國，但是我也寧缺勿濫。

to be self-interested
better to have nothing (than substandard choice) (idiom); would prefer to go without than accept shoddy option
to use force

to not take to heart/to be free of worried thoughts/to adopt a lighthearted perspective/lighthearted

coward/useless scoundrel
